entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of rain or snow mixed with drizzle beginning before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow mixed with drizzle ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
